segments.text: Yes . This is room 804 . I can't find my coat . I was wondering if it's in the lost and found .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can check for you . Could you describe the coat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's a light blue coat . It's got a hood and a big silver zipper .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When was the last time you saw it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Last night . I think I may have left it in the lobby bar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I â€™ ll check the lost and found and with the bar manager . We'll do our best to find it .
segments.speaker: S1
